device_mount: Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Mounted to wall
devices_included: Any screen device; Phone; Tablet; Whiteboard, large vertical display; Tabletop, large horizontal display; Laptop; Desktop computer
contribution_desc: Study about re-configuring virtual workspaces in MDEs.
crossdevice_def:
"...multi-display environments (MDEs) are increasing in popularity. Whether it is a three-screen multi-monitor display, or a large, technology-rich "situation room", equipped with a plethora of screens on the walls and tables, ..."

COLLABORATIVE MDEs:
"collaborative MDEs consist of a combination of large static public displays and individual users' private mobile computing devices such as laptops"
